hero.title: 3x10.org
hero.tagline: 3 days. 10 technical builders. $3k USD grant each
hero.subtitle: the most intensive program for latin american founders
hero.problem: latam has world-class talent but lacks focused execution capital

program.title: program
program.intro: 10 technical founders. 3 days at our hacker-house in santiago. each receives $3,000 equity-free to build
items: intensive build sprint with dedicated mentorship from seasoned founders
program.venue: the first edition will be hosted in platanus' house in chile, the most active VC in the region

target.title: target
items: technical co-founder or exceptional solo-founder building software products
early signal: users, revenue, or compelling traction metric
can commit 3 days full-time in santiago
target.notRequired: not required: formal accelerator, VC backing
target.required: required: bias to action, technical prowess, hunger

sponsorship.title: sponsorship packages
sponsorship.intro: contributions in cash or equity. flexible for each sponsor.

exclusive.name: exclusive sponsor
items: logo on stream at all times

last.label: last call
last.description: final date to close sponsorship. logo on merchandising not guaranteed.

impact.title: [Impact on social]
impact.intro: in 6 months we reached 2m views just from the founders' posts.

distribution.title: [distribution]
partners: indies.la: largest collective of builders in latin america, from indie-hackers to yc-backed founders
platanus: most active venture capital firm in the region
latec: latin american committee for entrepreneurship and technology, combined audience of +10k members
